<div class="MMM--grids-col MMM--grids-col_pdpMain">
<p class="SNAPS--pdpTabDes">3M™ High Intensity Prismatic Reflective Sheeting Series 3930 is non-metalized microprismatic lens reflective sheeting designed for production of reflective durable traffic control signs, work zone devices and delineators that are exposed vertically in service.</p>
<p class="SNAPS--pdpTabDes">Exceeds MS 1216:2003, LLM T1/07, JKR ATJ 2E/87 (Pindaan 2011) JKR 21300-0033-12 and ASTM D4956-16b minimum reflectivity requirements</p>
<p class="SNAPS--pdpTabDes"></p>
<ul class="MMM--pdpList SNAPS--bullets">
<li>Excellent choice for FHWA Minimum Retroreflectivity Compliance</li>
<li>Meets multiple specifications</li>
<li>Tougher top coat</li>
<li>Performance warranted for up to 8 years</li>
<li>Vivid daytime colors</li>
<li>Improved optical package</li>
</ul>

<ul class="MMM--pdpList SNAPS--bullets">

<li>Work zone signs</li>
<li>Delineators</li>
